meanings.definition: A person who moves or acts slowly.
meanings.sent1: The slowpokes took their time walking to school.
meanings.sent2: I always get stuck behind slowpokes in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The slowpokes in the race were so relaxed, they might as well have been strolling in the park.
meanings.sent4: Compared to the energetic rabbits, the tortoises seemed like slowpokes.
meanings.sent5: The slowpokes in the group made the journey feel like a leisurely stroll.

meanings.sent1: Don't slowpokes when we're running late!
meanings.sent2: I tend to slowpokes when I'm tired.
meanings.sent3: The snail slowpokes along the garden path, enjoying the scenery.
meanings.sent4: Time slowpokes when you're having fun with friends.
meanings.sent5: The old car slowpokes up the steep hill, struggling with each turn of the wheel.
